remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum for extended addition, analogous to ~ add4d .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Dec-2017.)
statement:
xadd4d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. RR* /\ A =/= -oo ) ) $.
xadd4d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( B e. RR* /\ B =/= -oo ) ) $.
xadd4d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( C e. RR* /\ C =/= -oo ) ) $.
xadd4d.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( D e. RR* /\ D =/= -oo ) ) $.
xadd4d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A +e B ) +e ( C +e D ) ) = ( ( A +e C ) +e ( B +e D ) ) ) $.
